description.en: KingdomX is a metaverse medieval game designed around gamefi protocol. Gamers and stakers are able to build, collect, mint, compete, and earn through our deflationary KingsLanding Protocol. Our double trifold mechanics (Repu - Hero - KT) or (Mint - burn - reward) is designed to project the game engine into a long-term moon ride.
